attributes.action: BOOT CAMP FOR RIOTERS AND THEIR WHOLE FAMILY
attributes.additional_details:
To deal out a short, sharp shock to the rioters AND start the process of families taking responsibility, set up boot camps but send the whole immediate family.

If a brother or mother or sister for example realises they will be included in punishments they may start to positively influence the perpetrators/family members in the future.

Nothing will be gained from imprisonment & the under 18s are not allowed to be sent anyway.

The strict, disciplined regime and hard work ie repairing the damage they have done & meeting, face to face, people who have had their lives ruined will not only have a short term impact but a longer term one also and start a process of responsibility.

This will cost no more than prison for 1 person so long as benefits are cut also.

My recommendation is to be sent for 6-12 months.
